ARABIC: إِنَّهُۥ مِن سُلَيْمَٰنَ وَإِنَّهُۥ بِسْمِ ٱللَّهِ ٱلرَّحْمَٰنِ ٱلرَّحِيمِ

ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_0: It is from Sulayman and says: "In the name of Allah, All-Merciful, Most Merciful.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_1: It is from Solomon, and (says): 'In the name of Allah, Ar-Rahman, Ar-Rahim.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_2: It is from Solomon, and it is: "In the name of Allah, the Most Merciful, the Most Compassionate."
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_3: It reads, 'From Soloman. In the Name of God, the Beneficent and the Merciful.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_4: “Indeed it is from Sulaiman, and it is (begins) with ‘Allah – beginning with the name of – the Most Gracious, the Most Merciful.’”
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_5: Verily, it is from Sulayman, and it (reads): `In the Name of Allah, the Most Gracious, the Most Merciful;'
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_6: Surely it is from Sulaiman, and surely it is in the name of Allah, the Beneficent, the Merciful;
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_7: It is from Solomon, and it is "In the Name of God, the Merciful, the Compassionate.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_8: Lo! it is from Solomon, and lo! it is: In the name of Allah, the Beneficent, the Merciful;
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_9: It is from Solomon. It reads, "In the name of God, Most Gracious, Most Merciful,
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_10: Verily it is from Sulaiman, and verily it is: in the name of Allah, the Compassionate, the Merciful.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_11: It is from Solomon, and it begins in the name of Allah, the All-beneficent, the All-merciful.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_12: It is from Solomon, and is (as follows): 'In the name of Allah, Most Gracious, Most Merciful:
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_13: Verily! It is from Sulaiman (Solomon), and verily! It (reads): In the Name of Allah, the Most Beneficent, the Most Merciful;
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_14: It is from Solomon and it is "In the Name of Allah, the Merciful, the Most Merciful.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_15: It is from Solomon, and it is, ‘In the Name of God, the Gracious, the Merciful.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_16: Indeed, it is from Solomon, and indeed, it reads: 'In the name of Allah, the Entirely Merciful, the Especially Merciful,
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_17: [27:30] It is from Solomon and lo! it is, in other words, its text says: “In the Name of God, the Compassionate, the Merciful.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_18: (Lo! it is from Solomon, and lo! it is) the first line of it is: (In the name of Allah the Beneficent, the Merciful;
